Moms Gear Comfy massaging bed rest hits the spot | Charlotte Observer

Order Reprint of this Story March 30 2018 04 00 AM The Nap Shiatsu Massaging Bed Rest from Brookstone could become a high-demand item in any household. This foldable bed rest provides back support for anyone working on a laptop or reading a book from their bed or even a spot on the floor. Not only is it soft and cushy all over but it also provides a deep rolling massage to the lower back when powered on. Be aware that this massage is not light. Two dual-heads run for 20 minutes massaging the lower back at a fairly intense depth. Fortunately a cloth flap with a pillow folds over the center of the rest putting some cushioning between the massaging nodes and the lower back. Also the power button can be pushed at any time to reverse the direction of the massaging nodes. The entire bed rest is made of the same fabric as the cloth flap â€“ a type of nap material that is extremely soft. A cup holder on the left armrest provides room for a drink although the cup holder is not deep enough to do any cup justice. Pockets run along the exterior side of both armrests providing room to stash a book a notepad or a remote. To use the backrest simply unfold the center piece of the rest to an upright position. Plug the adaptor into the right arm hit the power button and sit back and relax. When it s time to put the rest away just fold the center part down between the two arms and tuck the entire rest away.
